plot: A young fisherman flees his home after his village was massacred. Along his escape, he looses himself in the geological wonder of his land. 40 years later in Europe, Adisu is an old taxi driver in search of a memory of a lost love.
title: L'éclat furtif de l'ombre
plot_es: A young fisherman flees his home after his village was massacred. Along his escape, he looses himself in the geological wonder of his land. 40 years later in Europe, Adisu is an old taxi driver in search of a memory of a lost love.
